metadata.title: Electric Pulse: A Journey of Self-Discovery and Transformation
metadata.excerpt: A deeply personal exploration of awakening through music and the journey toward authentic self-awareness.

content.subtitle: How AI-generated music became a catalyst for spiritual awakening and creative breakthrough

content.text: Hello, world! I've always believed in the power of music to tell stories and convey deep emotions & concepts. Music is one of my top passions, and you should expect to see that as an important outlet to convey information. For years, I struggled to translate the ideas in my head onto paper with only limited success. Then everything changed when I discovered AI music generation during a routine educational YouTube session. Within a couple of days, I had created "Electric Pulse" - my first song in this new chapter of musical expression. While this was my first attempt and I didn't spend extensive time perfecting every lyrical nuance, I was ready to show the world what I could do, because this is only the beginning.

sections.title: The Concept: Awakening to New Consciousness

paragraphs: "Electric Pulse" was written to represent coming into a new state of being or obtaining profound insight. I imagined what it would be like to first become self-aware, not as a child, but as an adult with a fully-formed mind, complete command of language, and the capacity to learn.

The electric pulse represents that initial spark of new life - awakening from a shadow experience and recognizing both the vastness of existence and the minuteness of one's self. This awakening is like emerging from darkness into light, suddenly aware of infinite possibilities and your place within them.

In the deeper verses, I explore the fundamental conflict between logical thinking and raw emotion. I believe it's essential to effectively merge these two forces to achieve the next level of self-awareness and overall intelligence.

This integration has taken me on a journey where I'm pushing the boundaries of knowledge and confronting fears that once held me back. As a person of faith - it's literally in my name - the mysteries of the soul are tightly woven with my spirituality. This song represents a spiritual awakening, a call to start walking in your true purpose.
From my Christian perspective, it reminds me of the transformative power when you welcome the Holy Spirit and become the new creation you were destined to be (2 Cor. 5:17).

sections.title: Purpose: Building a Future of Unity

paragraphs: We often hide our true thoughts and feelings, but I want to draw those authentic parts of ourselves into the light. I have found my purpose - I am awake and alive, and it is exhilarating! If I'm not dedicating myself to dismantling systems that have held myself and others back, working toward a future free of hatred and discrimination, then I'm honestly wasting my time.

I used to dismiss self-reflection and meditation as useless endeavors, and I deeply regret that perspective. Coming to the revelation of who you truly are is critical and life-giving. I'm going against the mold to create something new, something unprecedented.

The pulsating electronic beats and soaring synths in "Electric Pulse" were chosen to evoke this sense of energy and awakening, with dynamic build-ups creating feelings of liberation and empowerment. I want to build this transformative future with all of you.
